text: Pen agak, Nɨgtep gɨnɨmɨb agak. Yad ownɨg, bɨ tap si dep okok, ma nɨg mɨdebal won ak opal tek ak ownɨgayn agak. Anɨb ak nɨm, bɨ wɨsɨn ma kɨnɨl, chech ne wulep sɨŋak lɨl yenɨgab ak, bɨ anɨb ak chɨb mɨgan day nep ma amek, nebeŋ ma gɨnɨgab. Mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgab agak.16.15 Takaw anɨb ak layn 15 mɨdeb, Jisas Klays ne ke agak.
